description: Manage the Kik Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot kik create
commands.summary: Create the Kik Channel on a bot.
commands.syntax:
az bot kik create --key
                  --name
                  --resource-group
                  --user-name
                  [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                  [--is-validated {false, true}]
                  [--location]
examples:
az bot kik create -n botName -g MyResourceGroup -u mykikname \
--key key --is-validated

commands.name: az bot kik delete
commands.summary: Delete the Kik Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot kik show
commands.summary: Get details of the Kik Channel on a bot.
